text: Ronald Lewis Schlicher (September 16, 1956 – September 26, 2019) was an American diplomat and career foreign service officer. He was the Deputy Chief of Mission in Lebanon (chargé d'affaires) 1994–96 and United States Consul- General in Jerusalem in 2000–02. He also served as ambassador to Cyprus in 2006–08.U.S. Dep’t of State: Biography of Ronald L. Schlicher He was born in Chattanooga, Tennessee. Schlicher died on September 26, 2019 in Brentwood, Tennessee at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:People from Chattanooga, Tennessee
title: Ronald L. Schlicher
